alert.note: Alert for Ashland; Bayfield; Sawyer (Wisconsin) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Duluth (Northeast Minnesota and Northern Wisconsin)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued April 23 at 10:48PM CDT by NWS Duluth
info.description: ...Strong thunderstorms will impact portions of southeastern Bayfield, southwestern Ashland and central Sawyer Counties through 1115 PM CDT... At 1047 PM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking strong thunderstorms along a line extending from near Town of Delta, to 6 miles northeast of Round Lake, to near Exeland, moving northeast at 40 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 40 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow unsecured objects around. Locations impacted include... Chippewa Flowage West, Chippewa Flowage East, Ashland, Washburn, Sanborn, Cable, Barksdale, Drummond, Marengo, Winter, Radisson, Exeland, New Post, Ino, Town of Delta, Benoit, Clam Lake, Namekagon Lake, Namekagon, and Spider Lake. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: Anyone outdoors, including anyone on or in the water, should seek shelter inside a sturdy building or hard topped vehicle.
